sub_title: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.
summary:
Kai is a results-driven and quality-focused consultant with over 25 years of experience in marketing, sales and service. Especially skilled at implementing SAP solutions to support these areas, including SAP C/4HANA (Service and Sales Cloud), SAP Field Service Management (FSM), SAP S/4HANA Customer Management, SAP CRM and integration with other applications.

A talent for analyzing business problems, developing and simplifying processes, and finding innovative solutions. He is a supportive and trustworthy team player who also works effectively with persons from other countries and cultures. His attitude is to produce the best results in cooperation with the client, either as a (pre-sales) consultant, solution architect, team lead, project manager or Scrum Master.

Worked for customers in a wide variety of industries, including:
• Belastingdienst (NL)
• Copaco (NL)
• Corporate Express (NL)
• ERIKS (NL)
• Huntsman (NL)
• ING / Nationale Nederlanden (NL)
• MSD Animal Health (NL)
• Kverneland (NO)
• Manpower Group (NL)
• Marafiq (SA)
• Maxxium (NL, UK, FR)
• Mediq (NL)
• Medtronic (NL)
• Océ Technologies / Canon (NL)
• Orange Telecom (NL)
• Philips (NL)
• Rieber & Son (NO)
• Sanctuary Group (UK)
• SAP (NL)
• Schippers (NL)
• Strukton Worksphere (NL)
• TNT Post (NL)
• University of Amsterdam (NL)
• Vebego (NL)
• Yamanouchi (NL)

school.name: NIMBAS, Bradford - Graduate School of Management

certifications.name: SAP Certified Application Associate – SAP Hybris Cloud for Sales

projects.title: BMI Group - SAP 2One Belgium & Netherlands
projects.description:
BMI Group is Europe's largest roofing solutions supplier. The group has initiated the 2One Programme which will migrate the current European businesses from their legacy systems onto a single SAP landscape which enable the transition to a set of standardised processes and operating procedures, enabling efficiencies, synergies and a single source of common data.

Personal responsibilities: 
- Support SAP C4C Business Process Lead and Superusers in Belgium and Netherlands
- Support the business to adapt their sales and complaints processes and adopt the global template
- Perform Functional Integration Testing (FIT)
- Perform second line support after the successful go live of BE and NL in July 2023

contributors.headline: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.

projects.title: EQUANS - Migration SAP CRM > Salesforce
projects.description:
EQUANS is the world leader in multi-technical services with offices in 17 country hubs and 74,000 employees. The Dutch companies started a project in which they bring all customer information from multiple commercial-operational processes, together in a 360-degree customer view and at the same time replacing SAP CRM by Salesforce as their central CRM system. 

Personal responsibilities:
- Gathering requirements and refinement of user stories, especially related to the integration between 
Salesforce and SAP ERP / SAP BW / Planon / Acto.
- Coordinate design and implementation of interfaces
- Support Product Owner

contributors.headline: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.

projects.title: Mediq: Migration to SAP, Enhancements in SAP Sales Cloud
projects.description: Mediq has approximately 3,000 employees, who serve healthcare institutions, caregivers and patients in 13 European countries. To enhance the service to patients and improve efficiency, a legacy system was replaced by implementing new functionality in their current landscape that is based on SAP. Kai joined the project team as IT Solution Manager to enhance SAP CRM Service, Sales and Interaction Centre. Since the go live of this project in June 2021, Kai is also working on several changes in SAP Sales Cloud (C4C).

contributors.headline: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.

projects.title: Manpower Group: GRC project
projects.description: Following the implementation and roll-out of new software systems in the Netherlands, the Manpower Group initiated a separate project to improve Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC) including GDPR. During 5 months, a team led by Kai, analysed the current set-up and implemented several hundred improvements especially in the areas of user authorisations and privacy.

contributors.headline: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.

projects.title: ERIKS: Implementation of (SAP) service management
projects.description:
ERIKS revised its corporate strategy in 2016 and decided to transform the company from being a supplier of high-quality mechanical components to become a leading partner for asset life cycle management. 
To achieve this goal several projects have been carried out to improve their service management processes and implement SAP ERP Customer Service (CS) and SAP Field Service Management (FSM) to support these processes. In this (servitization) project Kai had the role of project / program manager, and Scrum Master.

contributors.headline: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.
Senior Lead Business & certified SAP Consultant- PLM & EAM  & SAP Functional Architect

projects.title: Strukton Worksphere: SAP C/4HANA Service Cloud implementation
projects.description:
Strukton Worksphere creates healthy, safe, comfortable and sustainable environments for people to live, work and travel in. It achieves this by handling every aspect of the management of buildings and technical systems through an integrated approach to their design, development, realisation, maintenance and operation.
Late 2016 Strukton Worksphere decided to replace their custom build service desk application by SAP C/4HANA Service Cloud (C4C). The project is a cooperation of Strukton and Ciber, and includes interfaces to SAP ERP, e-mail and sms systems, portals, building management systems (IoT), a back-office application and telephony integration (CTI).

Activities:
•	Design solution and enhancements
•	Support other consultants and developers
•	Configure C4C
•	Support and set-up integration with other systems
•	Create reports and dashboards

contributors.headline: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.

projects.title: Schippers - Implementation SAP Hybris Service Cloud: Service & Repair
projects.description:
The MS Schippers Group is an international marketing, sales and service organisation for professional livestock farmers, with headquarters in The Netherlands. 

After the successful implementation and roll-out of SAP Hybris Cloud for Sales in 2016 and the Cloud for Service front office scenarios in 2017, further functionality has been implemented in 2018 to support field service & repair processes. This project covered contract, quotation and ticket management, (preventive) maintenance, and extensive integration between SAP ERP and SAP C4C.

The project received the SAP Quality Silver Award for Fast Delivery.

Activities:
• Design solution
• Optimise processes
• Configure C4C

contributors.headline: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.

Team Lead Integration & Lowcode bij Royal BAM Group nv

projects.title: Schippers: SAP Hybris Service Cloud implementation
projects.description:
The MS Schippers Group is an international marketing, sales and service organisation for professional livestock farmers, with headquarters in The Netherlands. 
After the successful implementation and roll-out of SAP Hybris Cloud for Sales in 2016, Schippers decided to improve their service processes supported by SAP Hybris Cloud for Service. The first phase will focus on customer service and complaint management. 

Activities:
•	Design solution
•	Configure C4C
•	Create reports and dashboards

contributors.headline: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.

projects.title: Vebego: Implementation and roll-out SAP Hybris Cloud for Customer
projects.description:
Vebego is a family company that operates internationally in the areas of facility services, personnel services, healthcare and sheltered employment. Its total managed turnover in 2013 was € 1,065 million.
To enable further growth, Vebego started the implementation of SAP ECC and Hybris Cloud for Customer (C4C) at Hago Zorg, one of their 120 operating companies. 
After the go-live of the initial implementation in June 2015, Kai joined the roll-out team and is responsible for implementing changes in C4C.

The project received the prestigious SAP Quality Gold Award for Digital Transformation.

Activities:
- Configure C4C
- Set-up integration between SAP C4C and SAP ECC
- Perform migration activities
- Implement changes

contributors.headline: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.
Customer Experience Consultant bij Acorel

projects.title: Schippers: PoC and implementation SAP Hybris Cloud for Customer
projects.description:
The Schippers Group is an international marketing, sales and service organisation for professional livestock farmers, with headquarters in The Netherlands. 
After delivering a paid Proof of Concept at the end of 2015, the customer was convinced of the C4C capabilities to support and enhance their sales and service processes. The Agile/Scrum based implementation project started in week 1 2016, lasted 13 weeks and was delivered on time and budget. On the go-live date 80 employees started working with C4C and many more will follow during the roll-out to other countries. The scope of the project covers Cloud for Sales and extensive integration with SAP ERP using SAP HANA Cloud Integration (HCI).

Activities:
- Design solution
- Configure C4C
- Set-up integration between SAP C4C and SAP ECC
- Create reports

contributors.headline: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.

SAP Solution Specialist Sales & Marketing at Swinkels Family Brewers

projects.title: Bosch: Design blueprint for new business model
projects.description:
Bosch Thermotechniek in Deventer is a subsidiary of the Thermotechnology Division of the Bosch Group and a leading supplier of heating products and hot water solutions in Europe. 
After extensive market research, Bosch wants to introduce a new business model to defend and increase their market share. To support this, an extensive enhancement of their SAP template is required, for which Ciber created a high level blueprint. This design covers almost all aspects of SAP CRM Service, and related logistic and financial integrations with ERP.

Activities:
- Design solution
- Present to and share blueprint with international stakeholders

contributors.headline: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.

projects.title: Philips: Disentanglement Lumileds SAP E-Commerce and ReX
projects.description:
In 2014 Royal Philips started the process to combine its Lumileds (LED components) and Automotive lighting businesses into a stand-alone company within the Philips Group. This process has been completed on April 1st 2015, just one day after the announcement that the new company was sold to third party investors.
To enable the set-up of this company, Philips and Ciber conducted a large scale project to disentangle the Lumileds and Automotive businesses in the SAP landscape.
Kai joined this project to perform this disentanglement in SAP CRM including the connected B2B web shops.

Activities:
- Design solution
- Configure SAP CRM
- Perform migration activities
- Set-up web shops for the new company
- Migrate SAP Retail Execution solution

contributors.headline: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.
Competence Lead SAP Customer Experience at Flexso

projects.title: Sanctuary (UK): Implementation SAP CRM
projects.description:
Sanctuary is the UK’s leading provider of care, housing and community services. With a staff of 11,000, this organisation successfully provides a diverse range of services and manages approx. 100,000 accommodations in England and Scotland. Sanctuary’s drive to work more commercially will be enabled through the implementation of the SAP platform. This common platform will provide a solid foundation to build upon, react and adapt to changes, both internally and externally, and ultimately support further growth of the business. The implementation of SAP CRM will support the contact centres with 700 call centre agents and several thousands back office employees.

Activities:
- Design solution
- Build proof of concept
- Implement SAP CRM Interaction Centre and Service Request Management including extensive use of decision-based checklists
- Configure integration between SAP CRM and ECC
- Implement Customer/Vendor Integration (CVI)
- Design customisations
- Support other consultants and developers

projects.title: Province of Noord-Brabant: Create design for SAP Grantor Management for Grantor
projects.description:
The Province of Noord-Brabant provides grants for all kinds of projects to create an excellent environment for economic and social development towards a high quality of life and, through this, to achieve an innovative and globally competitive region. Following a centralisation of grant related activities, a study has been conducted to investigate the feasibility of SAP Grants Management for Grantor to support the Province’s grant processes. 
SAP Grantor integrates CRM, PSCD, AP/AR, FM, BI, and BRFplus into a powerful solution to address the requirements of organizations that fund grant programs.

Activities:
•	Perform fit-gap analyses
•	Create a high-level blueprint
•	Prepare and present the results of the study.

contributors.headline: Consultant and Project Manager (SAP) Customer Experience.
Op zoek naar nieuwe collega’s voor ons SAP Business One team

projects.title: SAP NL - Realisation of a Proof of Concept for GGN
projects.description:
GGN is a leading provider of credit management services in The Netherlands. To support increasing growth and productivity, GGN has decided to select and implement an ERP-system. 
As one of the leading vendors, SAP built a proof of concept for GGN and hired Kai to implement SAP Customer Financial Management (CFM). This is an integrated solution of SAP CRM (Interaction Centre) and Contract Accounts Receivable and Payable (FI-CA), to support customer-centric credit and collections processes.

projects.title: Samlerhuset / Deloitte: Quality Audit SAP CRM Blueprint
projects.description: Samlerhuset is the European leader of coins and medals for collectors. In 2010, an international IT company established a blueprint for the implementation of SAP ERP, CRM and BI. In response, the customer decided to audit the results to be undertaken by Deloitte. Since Deloitte had not enough qualified consultants in the field of SAP CRM (the main part of the implementation) they enlisted the help of Sogeti.

projects.description: Nationale Nederlanden is market leader in the Netherlands in the field of insurance and applies to SAP CRM for the data collection of approximately 6 million customers and realise a full customer view for internal and external employees. In addition, the SAP CRM Interaction Centre has been implemented to improve the service to intermediaries and end customers.

projects.title: Medtronic: Upgrade SAP CRM
projects.description: Medtronic is the global leader in medical technology. To support the service to thousands of customers, this organization launched the global implementation of SAP CRM with emphasis on the interaction centre and integration with SAP ERP and SAP BI. In late 2009 the company decided to upgrade to SAP CRM version 7.0 to ensure an improved usability, and more efficient and effective handling of customer contacts.
